  15. /* data to catch conversion errors */
  16. ‌#define LUAC_DATA        "\x19\x93\r\n\x1a\n"

  18. ‌#define LUAC_INT        0x5678
  19. ‌#define LUAC_NUM        cast_num(370.5)

  21. ‌#define MYINT(s)        (s[0]-'0')
  22. ‌#define LUAC_VERSION        (MYINT(LUA_VERSION_MAJOR)*16+MYINT(LUA_VERSION_MINOR))
  23. ‌#define LUAC_FORMAT        0        /* this is the official format */
